law.catch_line: Description of watercraft operated during previous calendar year to be filed with department.
law.text: On or before May 15, 2009, and each May 15 thereafter, each corporation operating watercraft within this state during the previous calendar year shall file on forms prescribed by the department, a detailed description of all watercraft it operated as of January 1 of the current year.
law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 52, sec. 2, effective June 25, 2009. -- Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 169, sec. 3, effective January 1, 2008.
